title: 91/552/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 September 1991 establishing the status of Denmark as regards Newcastle disease
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 September 1991  establishing the status of Denmark as regards Newcastle disease (91/552/EEC)
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Denmark fulfils the criteria fixed by Article 12 (2) of Directive  90/539/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 September 1991.
For the Commission Ray MAC SHARRY Member of the Commission
(1) OJ NÂ° L 303, 31. 10. 1991, p. 6.
